name: GameAssist
description:
GameAssist is a modular Roll20 API automation suite for D&D 5E (2014 Character Sheet).

Features:
- Crit fumble handling
- NPC death auto-marking
- Concentration tracking
- Automatic HP rolling
- Enable/disable modules in-game
- Stable event queue
- In-chat configuration

API Commands:
!ga-enable, !ga-disable, !ga-config, !npc-hp-all, !npc-hp-selected, !npc-death-report, !concentration, !cc, !critfail, !critfumble

Requirements:
- TokenMod API (strongly recommended)
- Rollable tables for CritFumble (see README)

Setup and documentation:
github.com/Mord-Eagle/GameAssist
README: https://github.com/Mord-Eagle/GameAssist#readme

Compatible with D&D 5E (2014) sheet. For setup, troubleshooting, and latest updates, see the README. Please report bugs and feature requests via GitHub Issues.
conflicts: Other scripts that modify NPC HP or use bar1_value
